name: B2B Customer Segmentation -  Business User View
description: This app enables business users to identify target groups of customers based on their purchase patterns in B2B scenario.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Customer Segmentation Model Building Analytical App in B2B Scenario

Overview

The Customer Segmentation Model Building Analytical App in a B2B Scenario streamlines model training and validation for data science teams and integrates seamlessly into business operations to aid business users in customer segmentation. It provides key insights such as purchasing patterns and product preferences, empowering strategic decision-making. Additionally, the app facilitates Market Basket Analysis to uncover valuable customer behavior insights.

Input

  • + The app offers flexibility in data input for model training. Users can select attributes to train the model from product hierarchy, purchasing profiles, and sales transaction information.
  • + When training the model, users can also select different model types and specify the number of clusters to create the desired segments.
  • + For validation, users have the option to upload their own CSV data.

Output

  • + Upon completion of model training, it displays customer segmentation results.
  • + For validation, it performs segment prediction using the uploaded data and allows users to view segmentation results based on the model output.
  • + Additionally, it presents key insights such as weekly and monthly sales trends, store purchasing patterns, most-engaged and least-engaged store segments, and hidden characteristics of the segments (metrics by revenue-group, product-popularity).

Benefits

  • + Streamlined Model Development: The app simplifies model training and validation processes for data science teams, leading to more efficient and accurate customer segmentation.
  • + Enhanced Strategic Decision-Making: By providing key insights into purchasing patterns and product preferences, the app empowers business users to make more informed and strategic decisions regarding customer engagement and product offerings.
  • + Deeper Customer Understanding: The ability to perform Market Basket Analysis and uncover hidden characteristics of segments (like metrics by revenue-group or product-popularity) allows businesses to gain a much deeper understanding of their customer behavior.
  • + Customizable Segmentation: Users can select various attributes and define the number of clusters, enabling the creation of highly customized customer segments that are relevant to specific business objectives.
  • + Data-Driven Validation: The option to upload custom CSV data for validation ensures that businesses can test and refine their segmentation models with their own specific datasets, leading to more reliable and actionable results.

Data Description

FIELD NAME DESCRIPTION
Monthly_Invoice_Count Count of Invoices generated by a customer in a month.
Quarterly_Invoice_Count Count of Invoices generated by a customer in a quarter.
6M_Invoice_Count Count of Invoices generated by a customer in 6 months.
Monthly_Avg_Sales Average Sales amount across all invoices generated by a customer in a month.
Quarterly_Avg_Sales Average Sales amount across all invoices generated by a customer in 6 quarter.
6M_Avg_Sales Average Sales amount across all invoices generated by a customer in 6 months.
Customer_Age_In_Days Customer age in days denoting how long customer has been associated.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 }, { "components": [ { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": "float-right rounded", "tableView": false, "key": "next", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true, "hideOnChildrenHidden": false } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 } ], "key": "columns1", "type": "columns", "input": false, "tableView": false, "keyModified": true } ] }
